short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick access for Staff to BIS EduConnect, TigerBot, and ETM services.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The BIS Staff EduConnect extension provides BIS staff with quick, one-click access to essential resources: the BIS EduConnect Dashboard, TigerBot, and the ETM Support Ticket form. Simply open the extension, click the desired button, and a new tab will open, taking you directly to the selected tool. This extension streamlines access to BIS app tools and resources, saving you from repeatedly searching for URLs.
